name: Elastic
description: This plugin is used to deliver alerts/events data to Elastic platform.

configuration.label: Valid Extensions
configuration.default:
ECS Key Name,Length,Data Type
netskope.justification_type,,String
netskope.justification_reason,,String
@timestamp,,DateTime
cloud.account.id,,String
cloud.account.name,,String
cloud.region,,String
cloud.service.name,,String
destination.address,,String
destination.ip,,String
destination.domain,,String
destination.geo.country_name,,String
destination.geo.name,,String
destination.geo.postal_code,,String
destination.geo.region_name,,String
destination.geo.location.lat,,Integer
destination.geo.location.lon,,Integer
destination.port,,Integer
file.hash.md5,,String
file.mime_type,,String
file.name,,String
file.path,,String
file.size,,Integer
host.hostname,,String
rule.id,,Integer
rule.name,,String
source.address,,String
source.ip,,String
source.geo.country_name,,String
source.geo.name,,String
source.geo.postal_code,,String
source.geo.region_name,,String
threat.indicator.file.hash.md5,,String
threat.indicator.file.hash.sha1,,String
threat.indicator.file.hash.sha256,,String
user_agent.device.name,,String
user_agent.name,,String
user_agent.original,,String
user_agent.os.name,,String
user_agent.os.version,,String
user_agent.version,,String
user.email,,String
user.name,,String
user.roles,,String
event.id,,String
source.geo.country_iso_code,,String
destination.geo.country_iso_code,,String
threat.indicator.type,,String
